body.p: JohWm Allison states that he is a resident of Franklin County -- that he is the owner of one hundred & twenty six acres & ten poles of land in said county -- the title to which is encumbered by a down -- it is all paid for he owns five head of horses & other personal property amounting in all to the value of twelve hundred dollars & owes about two hundred dollars -- & that he believes he is worth after payment of his debts one thousand dollars

Zachariah Lee states that he has bought & paid for & is the owner of eleven acres ^& a half^ of land in Franklin County with $100 -- but has no title to it -- that he owns five head of horses & mules worth $200 -- has cash notes worth at least $400 & he believe you arehe is worth after the payment of your his debts about $700 --
Subscribed & sworn to by Wm Allison & Zachariah Lee before me August 26th 1862
J. L. Caldwell J. S. C. C.
